excerpt: "an autonomous-vehicle startup bought by Amazon in 2020. In fact, nearly all autonomous-vehicle companies now use simulation in some form. It speeds up testing, exposing the AI to a wider range of scenarios than it would see on real roads, and it cuts costs."
